attributes.action: Leave european court of human rights so the english borders are ours to control
attributes.additional_details: I want this to happen so we can police our own  borders  and we can decide who comes who goes in the uk as it should be
attributes.background: Leave the the eurropean court of human rights so we can pilice our own borders as the people of the uk voted for in the brexit referendum

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for a similar action:

Hold a referendum to decide if the UK should leave the ECHR
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/700614
